ai-patthana15.39:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
ai-patthana15.39:1.1_0: Mind consciousness doesn’t give rise to the mind. ...

ai-patthana15.39:2.1_0: Mind consciousness doesn’t give rise to the thought. The mind is not cause or condition for the thought.
